Package zuul.io.userInterfaces

Class CommandLineInterface

java.lang.Object
zuul.io.userInterfaces.CommandLineInterface
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserInterface
public class CommandLineInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements UserInterface
A command line UserInterface for the "World of Zuul" application.

This user interface uses the standard terminal command line to display messages and get input from the user.

  • Field Summary

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Sets the GameInterface to an instance of this class and starts the Game.

      This method should be called by Main to initialise this user interface.

      Parameters:
      args - the program arguments, not used

    • update

      public void update​(java.lang.String event)
      Does nothing. This interface does not change its behaviour based on Game events.
      Specified by:
      update in interface UserInterface
      Parameters:
      event - a string that describes the event that immediately follows this update, not null
